With her closest friends from Congress holding her hand Wednesday evening, Gabrielle Giffords opened her unbandaged left eye and tried to focus on loved ones for the first time. This is a major leap forward. This is a major milestone for her and we're hoping that she crosses through many more, said her neurosurgeon, Dr. Peter Michael Lemole. Sen. Kirsten Gillibrand , who was present for the eye opening, said: ''It was raw courage. It was raw strength. It was so beautiful and so

''What I hope is that Kelsey and I can improve our communications and truly co-parent our two wonderful children,'' her statement said. She also wished her ex and his fiancee, Kayte Walsh , love and happiness in their new marriage. Those are the kinds of good wishes that only a dollar sign followed by a lot of zeroes buys. Kelsey told David Letterman last month that he plans to marry Kayte Walsh this month.

Simon Cowell is apparently planning to unveil his US line-up as early as next week, and if he take Cheryl Cole and Dermot with him, it will cause major headaches for ITV. A show source said: ITV is pulling out all the stops to ensure Simon Cowell can do both shows, but he still hasn't agreed anything, which is frustrating. If Cheryl Cole and Dermot also have to travel back and forth it could be tricky. The last thing they want is for any of them to pull out.

want the Bill Clinton and Congress to work together on the big issues, not least the economy. Larry Sabato said the Republican takeover of the House of Representatives gives the Bill Clinton a new political lease on life. Once the Tea Party members of the House start having a full airing of their views, Barack Obama will appear more moderate. He's going to be nicely positioned between the old Barack Obama and the new Republican House. I've said for more than a year that if the Democrats hold both the House and the Senate Barack Obama might be a one-term Bill Clinton . Now he has someone to blame and someone to make him to look better. Colin Powell , former secretary of state in the Bush administration who endorsed Barack Obama in the 2008 election, said the Bill Clinton was well positioned politically. was a toss up between Simon Cowell and Bruce Forsyth over who was revealing less about their future plans. Simon Cowell kept mum over whether Cheryl Cole would be joining him for the US version of The X Factor- no one has been contracted apart from me- but did promise some changes for the ITV1 version of the talent show. , although his path to success wasn't always easy. In the 80s Simon Cowell had to move back in with his parents after falling into debt, and the experience was one which deeply affected him. I genuinely on an hourly basis want to teach myself that this is what can happen when you're successful is that you start to believe your own hype, he explained.
